channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MO
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MO

item.title: Report X-2023090590
item.description:
Report X-2023090590

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-11T15:10:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-07
  • City: SAINT PETERS
  • State: MO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: was found in tote in the unload, box was wet, no leakage on floor, brought spill pads over just in case DescribePack: no holes just one loose cap caused it to leak up if had been properly sealed that wouldn't have happened. DurationRel: 2 and MitigateEffect: spill pads, secured in hazmat tote and taken to the back for further loosing too./
